comments.author: k.kazantzoglou@gmail.com
comments.text: Upon Porting the Thunderbird settings to SeaMonkey 2.4 the mail folders in the server settings appear with the c:\ in front (For example : C:\E:\Mozilla Thunderbird\Mail_store\kkazantz_hotmail instead E:\Mozilla Thunderbird\Mail_store\kkazantz_hotmail)
comments.creator: k.kazantzoglou@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Upon Porting the Thunderbird settings to SeaMonkey 2.4 the mail folders in the server settings appear with the c:\ in front (For example : C:\E:\Mozilla Thunderbird\Mail_store\kkazantz_hotmail instead E:\Mozilla Thunderbird\Mail_store\kkazantz_hotmail)
How did you import your Thunderbird profile? Using the SeaMonkey profile migration function or manually?
comments.creator: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.text: How did you import your Thunderbird profile? Using the SeaMonkey profile migration function or manually?

comments.raw_text:

> How did you import your Thunderbird profile? Using the SeaMonkey profile
> migration function or manually?

I've used the SeaMonkey profile migration utility.

comments.raw_text: Hmm. Our profile migrator has known problems if the profile you're importing is located on a drive other than C:
